subtasks.name: Brainstorming Ideas
subtasks.description: Generate and gather initial ideas and concepts for the story.
subtasks.expected_output: A list of potential story ideas.

subtasks.name: Creating Characters
subtasks.description: Develop character profiles and traits for the main characters in the story.

subtasks.name: Establishing Setting
subtasks.description: Define the time, place, and environment where the story takes place.
subtasks.expected_output: A concise description of the setting.

subtasks.name: Plot Development
subtasks.description: Outline the sequence of events and conflicts that will drive the story.

subtasks.name: Writing the First Draft
subtasks.description: Compose the initial version of the story based on the outline and character profiles.
subtasks.expected_output: The first draft of the story written.

subtasks.name: Editing and Revising
subtasks.description: Review and revise the first draft for clarity, coherence, and grammatical accuracy.
subtasks.expected_output: A polished version of the story.

subtasks.name: Final Review
subtasks.description: Conduct a final review before publishing or sharing the story.
subtasks.expected_output: A final draft ready for publication.
